task.question: What did the Levite explain to the Danite spies (Judg 18:4)?

choices.choice: How Micah had hired him as his priest
How he had left the home of his youth
How he built the idols for Micah
Where the spies would find open land

task.answer: How Micah had hired him as his priest

task.question: What did the Danite spies request of the Levite (Judg 18:5)?

choices.choice: To persuade Micah to let them stay in his house
To inquire of God whether their journey would be successful
To pray to the Lord to bless their journey
For food and wine to sustain them on their journey

task.answer: To inquire of God whether their journey would be successful

task.question: According to the Levite, the Danite spies journey _____ (Judg 18:6).

choices.choice: Would be lead them into new territory
Would end in them capturing Laish

task.question: When the Danite spies arrived, how were the people of Laish living (Judg 18:7)?

choices.choice: In close community and alliances with the nearby towns

task.question: Why were the people of Laish prosperous (Judg 18:7)?
With what other city did the people of Laish have a relationship (Judg 18:7)?
How did the people of Laish interact with those close around them (Judg 18:7)?

choices.choice: They lived in close community with several other towns
They shared a temple and a high place with Hazor
They had no relationship with anyone else

task.answer: They had no relationship with anyone else

task.question: What report did the five Danite spies give to Eshtaol and Zorah about Laish (Judg18:9)?

choices.choice: The men at Laish were weak
The men have alliances with many cities

task.question: 14. What kind of land did the Danites say would be found (Judg 18:10)?

choices.choice: A spacious land that lacks nothing
A prosperous land with olive groves
A promised land upon which the Lord’s blessing rests

task.answer: A spacious land that lacks nothing

task.question: How many men from the Danites went out from Zorah and Eshtaol to attack Laish (Judg 18:11)?
